synopsis.text:
So, meet Ranze, a typical junior high school girl with an atypical family: her father is a vampire, and her mother is a werewolf. As if navigating the trials and tribulations of adolescence wasn't challenging enough, Ranze has yet to exhibit any supernatural abilities, much to her parents' concern. But when she discovers her unique power to shapeshift into anything she bites, her life takes a dramatic turn.

Amidst the chaos of her newfound abilities, Ranze finds herself in a love triangle with the charming Paul and the envious Lisa. To complicate matters further, the laws of the dark kingdom forbid a union between a being of darkness and a human. As Ranze struggles to win Paul's affection, she must also contend with her parents' disapproval and Lisa's jealousy.

With her parents' constant bickering, a new power to control, and a forbidden love to pursue, Ranze's life is anything but ordinary. Will she be able to balance her supernatural life with her desire to be a normal girl? Only time will tell in this thrilling and heartwarming fantasy romantic comedy.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
